```{r}
mini_table <- surveys %>%
na.omit() %>%
group_by(plot_type) %>%
filter(species_id == "NL") %>%
count() 

mini_table
```
```{r}

table <- mini_table %>% 
rename_at("plot_type", ~"Experimental Treatment")

table <- table %>% 
  rename_at("n", ~ "Number Sampled")

table

```


```{r}

data_for_table <- surveys %>% 
  na.omit() %>% 
  select(species_id, weight, year) %>% 
  group_by(year) %>% 
  summarise(mean_weight = mean(weight)) %>% 
  arrange()

data_for_table

```

```{r}

DT::datatable(data_for_table)

```
